sound design / production

Offering and providing colorful sounds for visuals, assisting to immerse and dive into the right spirit/feeling by means of sonic dimension.

  • Music and sound design for animations

    • Composing music and music production.
    • Music sound design and various SFX creation.
    • Sonic solutions and sound selections that fit right for visuals.
    • Working with dynamics, mood and character of animation.

  • Music and sound design for commercial

    • Communication with director and producers, finding right music and audio solutions for client’s needs.
    • Reference selection.
    • Composing and music production.
    • Sound design and SFX creation.
    • Voice-over editing and mixing.
    • Mix and master.

  • Field recording and music for short video

    • Exploring and recording city sounds in Saigon, Vietnam.
    • Selection and arrangement recordings into one music collage.
    • Mixing and mastering.

  • Linear sound design for YouTube videos

    • SFX, Foley, Ambience, Acoustic curtains creation. Using different approaches and techniques:
      working with sound and sample libraries, layering, synthesis, recording, sampling/resamplimg.
    • Selection, editing and chopping music from audio stocks (Epidemic Sound).
    • Voice-over editing and mixing.
    • Mixing & Mastering to fit youtube’s technical requirements.
    • Operating on short time.

  • Reverse engineering

    • Sound analysis.
    • Recreating life-like sounds of campfire in the woods by means of synths, processing and layering.

  • Motion video sound design

    • Creating athmospheric drones and ambienses.
    • Underlining movement and motion of the video.

  • Music for mood video

    • Creating mood and “atmosphere” by means of music and little help of foley/ambience.

podcast editing

I help with sonic branding, editing, mixing and mastering for podcasts.

I have worked with podcast studios “Богема”, “Шторм” и “Техника речи”.

Among my works:

  • - mixing the podcast “ИИ тебя заменит”
    NB : now available only with Russian online service as a part of collaboration with MTS
  • - jingle for the studio “Техника речи” : short intro that’s being played in the beginning of every fresh episode of podcasts produced by this studio - for example, here or here
  • - Audio editing for individual episodes of the podcasts "Бизнес-план", "Дело привычки" and "Учитель нашего времени"

      • Podcast “What a day”

    • Editing, mixing and mastering
    • Within 30 days first episode held P1 in the category Personal Journals (Georgia & Belarus), P2 in the category Society & Culture (Belarus), P3 in the same Category in Georgia.

      Other

    1. 1. Unreleased jingle and outro for “What a day” podcast.
    2. 2. Editing, mixing and mastering for unreleased podcast + adapting song “Melikeyou” by Twit One into jingle and outro.

    mix / master

    I do music production, help with recording, mixing and mastering. In my sound I'm devoted to groove, sound textures and sharp audio solutions.

      аня крутеева – последний альбом

    • Composing and producing an album of an indie songwriter.

    foude faafa · meh

    about

    Hi! I'm Oleg, a sound designer, music producer and audio engineer.

    I have worked with variety of short-films, animations, podcasts and music artists. My foremost objective is to deliver creative solutions that fit your vision and help the final product to stand out.

    Download CV

    Live music

    Drummer with an experience in rock music and passion for modern jazz. Being a former member of several indie projects, I have a wide range of experience in studio recordings, live performances and tours.

    First studio recorded album with my former group “Sonya” won “Best emo” (2021) nomination held by Russian independent music media and label “Rodnoi Zvuk”.

    Education

    • BA Philosophy at Higher School of Economics (Moscow)
    • MA Philosophy and History of Religion at Higher School of Economics (Moscow) - unfinished due to leaving Russia
    • Music Production at Moscow Music School (under supervision of Andrey Ryzhkov) - unfinished due to leaving Russia
